name: Orc's Creed VR
description:
Have you ever wanted to play Assassin's Creed in VR?
Well not today, but let me at least entertain you with Orc's Creed.

Hello guys,

I am Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
